item.description: Are you ready to win Iowa & beyond? Please be at Martocchio Music in Simsbury 6pm on Dec. 10th. We will phone bank until the system shuts us off at 8:55pm and then settle in for the important Iowa debate at 9pm on ABC. If you have a laptop and cell phone to spare for the evening please bring it in case it's needed. I have ordered headsets and we should have 6 phone banking stations up and running if all goes as planned. They will be set up with inexpensive voip-based numbers so we can save our cell phone minutes. Thanks go to Sara for graciously letting us use the store - please call 860-730-3RON if you have any trouble finding it.
item.name: Phone Banking and Iowa Debate Watching Party
